DataElement.preferredName: Local-Regional Disease or Disorder Present At Registration Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to whether there is local-regional disease present at the time of patient registration.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Local-Regional Disease or Disorder Present At Registration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Whether there is local-regional disease present at the time of patient registration.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Local-Regional; affecting only a restricted part or area of the body.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to both a local and regional area of the body.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:Used to indicate position, location, or state.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
Used to indicate position, location, or state.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
